plot: A widowed lady rejects a business man so he buys a gypsy girl and contrives to have her marry the lady's son.
title: The Ashes of Revenge
plot_es: A widowed lady rejects a business man so he buys a gypsy girl and contrives to have her marry the lady's son.
plot_en: A widowed lady rejects a business man so he buys a gypsy girl and contrives to have her marry the lady's son.
